ESP8266_IoT.connectThingSpeak: Connect to ThingSpeak and upload data. It would not upload anything if it failed to connect to Wifi or ThingSpeak.
ESP8266_IoT.connectWifi: Initialize ESP8266 module and connect it to Wifi router
ESP8266_IoT.lastUploadState: Check if ESP8266 successfully uploaded data to ThingSpeak
ESP8266_IoT.thingSpeakState: Check if ESP8266 successfully connected to ThingSpeak
ESP8266_IoT.wifiState: Check if ESP8266 successfully connected to Wifi
